page.title: 01MAIDENHEAD - in 1985
page.content:
Maidenhead is a town that is seeing alot of change at present.1985 has seen the replacement of Brunel's railway bridge and the refurbishment of the shopping precinct at a cost of over Â£2 million.Old buildings have been demolished and office blocks have replaced them,but not to everyones satisfaction.The most controversial was the office block nicknamed "The Green Giant" because of its colour and size.1985 has also seen Maidenhead's last cinema,The ABC, disappear to make way for office development.
Despite all this development and change Maidenhead is still a desirable place to live.It has good road and rail links with London and the river with its beautiful riverside scenery.
